in.itzmeanjan.filterit.filter

Class MeanFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • in.itzmeanjan.filterit.filter.MeanFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Filter

    public class MeanFilter
extends java.lang.Object
implements Filter
    Given a buffered image, it'll compute mean of pixel intensities for a square matrix ( odd valued row & column numbers ), centered at P(x, y), for each color components ( i.e. R, G & B ), and update P(x, y) 's pixel intensity values in sink image.

    Concurrently processes each pixel, present in an image i.e. for a M x N image, we'll process M x N number of pixels; implementation of thread pool based concurrency allows us to leverage power of modern multi-core CPUs

    • Method Detail

      • filter

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage filter(java.awt.image.BufferedImage img,
                                           int order)
        Applies mean filter on given buffered image of given order

        order > 0 :: considers subimage of size ( 2*order + 1 ) x ( 2*order + 1 ), around P(x, y)

        order = 0, doesn't update image at all, considers itself only

        Specified by:
        filter in interface Filter
